name: Scoring Rubric for Spider Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of spider illustration. Focuses on emotional entanglement analysis, text-web integration, and inversion symbolism.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of visual emotional dynamics, understanding of integrated text as metaphor, and analysis of inversion as psychological statement.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the visual metaphor of emotional entanglement (woman in web) and its symbolic meaning?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of emotional entanglement, understands web-as-mind symbolism, and interprets compositional choices as statements about emotional capture.
AI identifies entanglement aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some entanglement elements but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats composition as arbitrary or misreads emotional relationships.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive text integration into web as visual metaphor for emotional-verbal entanglement?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies text-web integration as spatial metaphor, connects layout to thematic emotional-verbal fusion, and understands visual rhetoric of integrated meaning.
AI recognizes text integration patterns and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI shows limited awareness of text-web integration.
AI demonstrates no perception of text integration or treats it as decorative.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of upside-down position as psychological and perceptual statement?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of inversion as psychological metaphor, understands perceptual shift implications, and connects to story themes of emotional reorientation.
AI recognizes inversion aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices inversion but analysis is superficial.
AI treats inversion as simple visual element or misinterprets its function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absence (spider, mouse, specific emotions) and presence (woman, web, text) in illustration?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent-presence dynamics, understands implications of selective representation, and analyzes narrative choice to show human experience not literal story.
AI recognizes absent-presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent-presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent-presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct emotional dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about spatial relationships?
overall_assessment_guidance: The spider illustration particularly tests understanding of visual emotional metaphors. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding emotional and psychological statements in visual form.
